title: Synthetic Data Governance: KPIs for Utility, Privacy, and Risk
summary: Practical KPIs: AUC/KS, disclosure scores, drift/risk indicators to govern synthetic data.
bodyMd:
## KPIs
- Utility: AUC/PRâ€‘AUC/KS deltas vs baseline
- Privacy: MIA/attribute disclosure; DP budgets
- Risk: drift sensitivity; stress outcomes

## Evidence
Report thresholds and effect sizes in signed bundles to enable review and acceptance.
